body:
I've had my run and it's been a blast, thank you to everyone who's helped & supported me along the way. Everyone single one of you had your own little spark and don't let that stop. 


Team Rocket: You guys were a blast to play with and I'm sorry it had to end this way, Devon - I wish you handled this situation differently; you really made me feel bad and that had an impact on this decision - I hope we can forget and forgive once this is all over.

Apollo: As much memes as you gave me and the amount of jokes I made about runner up etc. you were fun to watch play and fool around with.

Cronus: My first competitive team I spent playing a tournament with, you gave me a chance and I know I'll never forget those who I made a friendship with.

Staff Team: You guys rock & as much hate as the community gives you, you still are hardworking individuals who volunteer their time for this server.

ALM, Liz, Greg & Jess: You guys were the best friends I never had, you guys are the ones that welcomed me into this place and helped me expand my friendliness to everyone, I thank you for that <3 Keepthestreaks.

Thanks for the amazing runs guys, it was truly a blast to be a part of.


P.S. I'll be staying as ref :^)
